General.Name: Astral Foods Ltd.
General.Description: Astral Foods Limited operates as an integrated poultry producer, engages in processing and production of broilers through its abattoirs in South Africa and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Poultry, Feed, and Other Africa. It also engages in the marketing, sale, and distribution of poultry products; and breeding and sale of day-old chicks and hatching eggs. The company also produces and sells feed products for farmed animal species; and provides laboratory analytical services to the animal feed industry. It offers its products under the Goldi, County Fair, Festive, Mountain Valley, Earlybird, and SupaStar brands. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Gauteng, South Africa.
